content:
User: If the file isn't downloadable, the view link works, but I need to extract text from HTML. This might be messier, so the download link is preferable for transcripts.

Grok: The user should provide the direct download link, like https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1WKOUjkKCUUBQv7u3hlwPvTLdyTIcf1fm. If that fails, the view link, https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WKOUjkKCUUBQv7u3hlwPvTLdyTIcf1fm/view?usp=drive_link, is an option.
